pages.text: Creepers are odd creatures that seems to possess gunpowder and a leafy exterior. By combining Leaves and TNT with a Crawling Focus, you've discovered a way to turn the Spiderlings into Creeperlings, which will explode near hostile creatures in the same manner as Creepers, but with the abilities of a Spider.
Wearing a Fel Robe will allow you to pass on any negative effects on to your Creeperlings. Much like Creepers, they will leave behind a cloud that spreads whatever effects they had.
